title: In major effort to end gender-affirming care, Trump administration takes aim at hospitals
description: The Trump administration intends to make its most forceful attempt yet at restricting gender-affirming care for transgender youth in the U.S.
content: The Trump administration intends to make its most forceful attempt yet at restricting gender-affirming care for transgender youth in the U.S.
